item.title: Open Sourcing Libraries Made Me A Better Developer
item.description: I was lucky enough to make my first open source contribution at my job early on. While I was working on a R&D project to convert a video game engine from C++ to WebGL in 2011, I was using an open source tool to automate that process. I was building a prototype and hit a bug. By looking at the source code, I was able to pinpoint the issue, opened a pull request and it was swiftly merged into the library.
item.author: me@ben.codes (Benoit Tremblay)
